name: Piratical
description:
Piratical is a pirate-themed roguelike where you control a pirate who has come to the buccaneer's den in the bayous of Louisiana to take revenge of the dread pirate Bloodbeard.

The game features traditional roguelike action with some special twists:

  • Swimming underwater
  • Voodoo curses
  • Piratical surgeries - have a hook for a hand, a peg leg, etc.
  • Flintlocks!
